METHOD.NAME: ItensErro
METHOD.ACTIONSCRIPT: SELECT "T" AS SYS_CHECKED, E.EBL_ITEM_ERRO AS ITEM_ERRO, E.EBL_INTEGRACAO AS INTEGRACAO, E.EBL_CODIGO AS CODIGO, IIF(E.EBL_STATUS="AG_LIBERACAO","BLOQUEADO DA INTEGRAÇÃO","TENTANDO INTEGRAR") AS STATUS, E.EBL_DATA AS DATA, E.EBL_TENTATIVAS AS TENTATIVAS, E.EBL_OBS AS OBS FROM EBL_ITENS_ERRO E WHERE E.EBL_INTEGRACAO = :INTEGRACAO [AND E.EBL_OBS LIKE #REPLACETR(:OBS)]
